name: comeback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 an attempt to become famous, powerful, or important again after a period of being much less famous, etc.: She's trying to make a comeback with her first album for 20 years.
More examplesFewer examplesUK Apparently bread and butter pudding is making a comeback in smart restaurants.A rich businessman is financing their comeback attempt.The singer staged a remarkable comeback with his latest album.The party's comeback was largely due to their promises to lower tax.
